title: Masters: Augusta winner for LIV would spark group celebration by 18th green
description: LIV Golf commissioner Greg Norman says he is getting "goosebumps" thinking about one of his players winning the Masters.

title: Olivier Awards 2023: Mescal, Comer and Totoro triumph
description: Paul Mescal and Jodie Comer win the main acting prizes while My Neighbour Totoro wins six awards.

title: PSG 0-1 Lyon: Lionel Messi's name whistled by own fans as PSG lose again
description: Lionel Messi's name is met by whistles from some Paris St-Germain fans before they fall to a seventh defeat of 2023 against Lyon.

title: Next Chelsea manager: Nagelsmann, Pochettino, Zidane - who should replace Potter?
description: BBC Sport looks at some of the title-winning managers who are currently out of work and could interest Chelsea after Graham Potter's sacking.

title: Aston Villa Women 0-3 Chelsea Women: Champions canter to ruthless win and move into second place
description: Chelsea move to within one point at the top of the Women's Super League table with a ruthless win over Aston Villa.

title: Graham Potter sacked by Chelsea after less than seven months in charge
description: Chelsea sack manager Graham Potter after less than seven months in charge of the Premier League club.

title: BBC presenter Susan Rae thanks listeners for support after Alzheimer's diagnosis
description: Radio 4 announcer Susan Rae was diagnosed last year and her sons launched an appeal to fund her care.

title: Opec oil producers announce surprise cut in output
description: The cuts by the Opec+ group amount to more than one million barrels per day and could push up prices.

title: Sanna Marin neck and neck with conservatives in early Finland voting
description: The PM's social democrats are almost level with the opposition conservatives in Finland's election.

title: Newcastle United 2-0 Manchester United: Magpies up to third in Premier League after win
description: Newcastle United leapfrog Manchester United into third place in the Premier League table and avenge their Carabao Cup final loss to the Red Devils.

title: Cafe bomb in St Petersburg kills military blogger
description: A bomb blast in a St Petersburg cafe kills Russian Vladlen Tatarsky, who blogged from the Ukraine frontline.

title: Trump 'gearing up for battle' at New York court hearing, lawyer says
description: The former president says he will address supporters in Florida after his Tuesday court hearing in New York.

title: Twitter's blue ticks disappear as Musk attacks NY Times
description: The New York Times Twitter account has lost its blue tick after it said it would not pay to stay verified.

title: Women's Six Nations: England 68-5 Italy highlights
description: Watch highlights as England continue their dominant start to the Women's Six Nations with a 12-try victory against Italy at Northampton's Franklin's Gardens.

title: Brendan Rodgers: Leicester City sack manager after four years in charge
description: Brendan Rodgers is sacked as manager of Leicester City after four years in charge following Saturday's defeat by Crystal Palace.

title: Heineken Champions Cup: Saracens 35-20 Ospreys - Max Malins claims two tries to seal last-eight spot
description: Max Malins scores two tries as Saracens come from behind to beat Ospreys 35-20 and set up a Heineken Champions Cup quarter-final with La Rochelle.

title: IPL 2023: Jos Buttler hits 54 off 22 balls in Rajasthan Royals win
description: England limited-overs captain Jos Buttler strikes 54 off 22 balls as Rajasthan Royals beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by 72 runs in the Indian Premier League.

title: Child sex abuse: Failure to report crimes to be made illegal
description: Ministers plan to compel teachers and social workers to flag up signs of abuse - or face sanctions.

title: Women's Six Nations 2023: England 68-5 Italy - Abby Dow scores four tries in emphatic win
description: England continued their dominant start to the Women's Six Nations with an 12-try victory against Italy at Northampton's Franklin's Gardens.

title: Two of three British men being held by Taliban allowed call to families
description: Kevin Cornwell, 53, and an unnamed man were said to have spoken "freely" during the phone call.

title: Brendan Rodgers: Leicester City sacking is a dramatic fall from grace for manager and club
description: Brendan Rodgers' sacking by Leicester represents a fall from grace for both manager & club, says BBC Sport's Phil McNulty.

title: Ryuichi Sakamoto: Japanese electronic music maestro dies
description: The award-winning composer and producer, whose fans included David Bowie, has died aged 71.

title: Cambridge student designs plastic windows for Ukraine homes
description: Harry Blakiston Houston's creations give "some kind of normality" to bullet and bomb-damaged homes.

title: Braverman says Rwanda is safe despite evidence of refugee killings
description: The home secretary is shown evidence by Laura Kuenssberg that refugees were shot dead by police there in 2018.

title: 'It's kicking off!' BBC's Bunce steps in to stop bust-up
description: Watch as 5 Live commentator Steve Bunce removes his headphones to hold Tony Bellew back during a ringside scuffle after the Anthony Joshua v Jermaine Franklin fight.

title: What's next for Anthony Joshua? Tyson Fury? Deontay Wilder? Dillian Whyte?
description: After Anthony Joshua's comfortable yet underwhelming win over Jermaine Franklin, BBC Sport looks at what's next for him.

title: Badminton star sent rape and death threats from gamblers
description: Commonwealth Games medallist Kirsty Gilmour says she feels violated by sickening messages.

title: Finland election: Three-way race as Sanna Marin fights for survival
description: A tight race sees right-wing populists and conservatives vying for power with the PM's centre left.

title: 'It's possible my family owned MP's ancestors'
description: Ex-BBC journalist Laura Trevelyan says it's possible her family owned Clive Lewis's ancestors.

title: Jo Wilson legacy: 'I want the world to talk about dementia'
description: Bill Wilson wants better understanding of dementia after losing his wife Jo to the disease.

title: Ukraine war: Where are Russia's opposition leaders now?
description: President Putin rules virtually unchallenged, with opponents forced to leave Russia - or worse.

title: Food prices: How the humble shopping list is saving us money
description: Soaring food prices mean some families are missing meals and desperate for deals, but preparation can help.
